tool_description: Detailed current conditions, hourly forecasts, daily forecasts, and weather alerts by latitude and longitude in JSON format.
name: Easy Weather
title: Easy Weather

api_list.name: Daily forecast (5 days)
api_list.description: Get a 5-day daily forecast for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Hourly forecast (240 hours)
api_list.description: Get a 240-hour forecast for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Hourly forecast (48 hours)
api_list.description: Get a 48-hour forecast for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Historical (daily)
api_list.description: Get a historical daily forecast for the given latitude, longitude, and start date/time.

api_list.name: Historical (hourly)
api_list.description: Get a historical hourly forecast for the given latitude, longitude, and start date/time.

api_list.name: Daily forecast (10 days)
api_list.description: Get a 10-day daily forecast for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Current conditions (basic)
api_list.description: Get (basic) current conditions for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Complete weather (single call)
api_list.description: Get current conditions, hourly forecast, daily forecast, and alerts in a single response for the given latitude and longitude (you must supply ISO country code to receive weather alerts).

api_list.name: Current conditions (detailed)
api_list.description: Get (detailed) current conditions for the given latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: Weather alerts
api_list.description: Get weather alerts posted by the local meteorological agency for the given latitude and longitude.
